[{"table_description": "The table presents a financial summary for the years 2021 and 2022, detailing fixed assets, current assets, creditors, net current assets, total assets less current liabilities, provisions for liabilities, net assets, and capital and reserves. It includes specific figures for property, plant and equipment, investments, debtors, prepayments, cash at bank, and various reserves.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Category | Notes | 2022 (£) | 2021 (£) |
|---|---|---|---|
| **FIXED ASSETS** | | | |
| Property, plant and equipment | 12 | 183,424 | 87,259 |
| Investments | 13 | | 150 |
| **CURRENT ASSETS** | | | |
| Debtors | 14 | 2,794,786 | 2,698,894 |
| Prepayments and accrued income | | 247,210 | 270,327 |
| Cash at bank | | 3,600,591 | 2,654,639 |
| **CREDITORS** | | | |
| Amounts falling due within one year | 15 | 3,511,369 | 3,047,806 |
| **NET CURRENT ASSETS** | | 3,131,218 | 2,576,054 |
| **TOTAL ASSETS LESS CURRENT LIABILITIES** | | 3,314,642 | 2,663,463 |
| **CREDITORS** | | | |
| Amounts falling due after more than one year | 16 | (224,643) | |
| **PROVISIONS FOR LIABILITIES** | 20 | (16,811) | 1 |
| **NET ASSETS** | | 3,073,188 | 2,663,463 |
| **CAPITAL AND RESERVES** | | | |
| Called up share capital | 21 | 5,996 | 7,048 |
| Capital redemption reserve | 22 | 1,753 | 701 |
| Share option reserve | 22 | 61,141 | 32,922 |
| Retained earnings | 22 | 3,004,298 | 2,622,792 |
| **SHAREHOLDERS' FUNDS** | | 3,073,188 | 2,663,463 |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the value of property, plant, and equipment in 2022?", "answer": "183,424"}, {"question": "How much were the debtors in 2021?", "answer": "2,698,894"}, {"question": "What is the total of current assets in 2022?", "answer": "6,642,587"}, {"question": "What were the net current assets in 2021?", "answer": "2,576,054"}, {"question": "How much cash was at the bank in 2022?", "answer": "3,600,591"}, {"question": "What was the amount of creditors falling due within one year in 2022?", "answer": "3,511,369"}, {"question": "What were the total assets less current liabilities in 2022?", "answer": "3,314,642"}, {"question": "What was the provision for liabilities in 2022?", "answer": "(16,811)"}, {"question": "What was the value of retained earnings in 2022?", "answer": "3,004,298"}, {"question": "What were the shareholders' funds in 2021?", "answer": "2,663,463"}], "table_type": "Balance Sheet"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides a summary of changes in equity for a company over two fiscal years, ending on 28 February 2021 and 28 February 2022. It includes details on called up share capital, retained earnings, capital redemption reserve, share option reserve, and total equity. The table outlines the balance at the start and end of each fiscal year, as well as changes due to dividends, total comprehensive income, share-based payment charges, and purchase of own shares.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Description                  | Called up share capital (£) | Retained earnings (£) | Capital redemption reserve (£) | Share option reserve (£) | Total equity (£) |
|------------------------------|-----------------------------|------------------------|-------------------------------|--------------------------|------------------|
| Balance at 1 March 2020      | 7,048                       | 2,255,866              | 701                           | 4,703                    | 2,268,318        |
| Changes in equity            |                             |                        |                               |                          |                  |
| Dividends                    |                             | (398,816)              | -                             |                          | (398,816)        |
| Total comprehensive income   |                             | 765,742                | 1                             |                          | 765,742          |
| Share based payment charge   |                             |                        |                               | 28,219                   | 28,219           |
| Balance at 28 February 2021  | 7,048                       | 2,622,792              | 701                           | 32,922                   | 2,663,463        |
| Changes in equity            |                             |                        |                               |                          |                  |
| Purchase of own shares       | (1,052)                     | (917,248)              | 1,052                         | I                        | (917,248)        |
| Dividends                    | 1                           | (250,862)              |                               |                          | (250,862)        |
| Total comprehensive income   | 1                           | 1,549,616              | 1                             |                          | 1,549,616        |
| Share based payment charge   |                             |                        |                               | 28,219                   | 28,219           |
| Balance at 28 February 2022  | 5,996                       | 3,004,298              | 1,753                         | 61,141                   | 3,073,188        |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the total equity at the beginning of the fiscal year on 1 March 2020?", "answer": "The total equity was £2,268,318."}, {"question": "How much were the retained earnings at the end of the fiscal year on 28 February 2021?", "answer": "The retained earnings were £2,622,792."}, {"question": "What was the impact of dividends on total equity in the fiscal year ending 28 February 2021?", "answer": "Dividends reduced the total equity by £398,816."}, {"question": "What was the total comprehensive income for the fiscal year ending 28 February 2022?", "answer": "The total comprehensive income was £1,549,616."}, {"question": "How much did the share-based payment charge contribute to the share option reserve in each fiscal year?", "answer": "The share-based payment charge contributed £28,219 to the share option reserve in each fiscal year."}, {"question": "What was the balance of called up share capital at the end of the fiscal year on 28 February 2022?", "answer": "The balance of called up share capital was £5,996."}, {"question": "How did the purchase of own shares affect the capital redemption reserve in the fiscal year ending 28 February 2022?", "answer": "The purchase of own shares increased the capital redemption reserve by £1,052."}, {"question": "What was the total equity at the end of the fiscal year on 28 February 2022?", "answer": "The total equity was £3,073,188."}, {"question": "What was the change in retained earnings from 1 March 2020 to 28 February 2022?", "answer": "The retained earnings increased from £2,255,866 to £3,004,298."}, {"question": "What was the total impact of dividends on retained earnings over the two fiscal years?", "answer": "The total impact of dividends on retained earnings was a reduction of £649,678 (£398,816 + £250,862)."}], "table_type": "Others"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides a summary of cash flows from operating, investing, and financing activities for the years 2022 and 2021. It includes details on cash generated from operations, interest and tax payments, purchases and sales of assets, and changes in loans and equity. The table also shows the net cash flow from each activity and the change in cash and cash equivalents over the two years.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Activity | Notes | 2022 (£) | 2021 (£) |
|---|---|---|---|

| Cash flows from financing activities |  |  |  |
| New loans in year |  | 250,000 | 1 |
| Share buyback |  | (917,248) |  |
| Share capital paid up |  | 350 | 1 |

| Cash and cash equivalents at beginning of year | 2 | 2,654,639 | 2,215,626 |
| Cash and cash equivalents at end of year | 2 | 3,600,591 | 2,654,639 |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the net cash from operating activities in 2022?", "answer": "2,021,899"}, {"question": "How much cash was generated from operations in 2021?", "answer": "721,565"}, {"question": "What was the amount of interest paid in 2022?", "answer": "(753)"}, {"question": "How much tax was paid in 2021?", "answer": "(14,978)"}, {"question": "What was the net cash from investing activities in 2022?", "answer": "(158,187)"}, {"question": "How much was spent on the purchase of tangible fixed assets in 2022?", "answer": "(158,457)"}, {"question": "What was the net cash from financing activities in 2021?", "answer": "(398,816)"}, {"question": "How much was the increase in cash and cash equivalents in 2022?", "answer": "945,952"}, {"question": "What were the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of 2022?", "answer": "2,654,639"}, {"question": "What were the cash and cash equivalents at the end of 2021?", "answer": "2,654,639"}], "table_type": "Statement of Cash Flow"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides financial data for the years 2022 and 2021, including operations such as profit before taxation, depreciation charges, and cash generated from operations. It also details cash and cash equivalents at the end of each year.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Description | 2022 (£) | 2021 (£) |
|---|---|---|
| Profit before taxation | 1,959,315 | 858,789 |
| Depreciation charges | 60,142 | 65,590 |
| Loss on disposal of fixed assets | 2,150 | - |
| Share based payment charge | 28,219 | 28,219 |
| Amounts written off investments | - | 140,346 |
| Finance costs | 8,674 | - |
| Dividend and interest income | (12,841) | (180,467) |
| Total | 2,045,659 | 912,477 |
| Increase in trade and other debtors | (107,396) | (62,002) |
| Increase/(decrease) in trade and other creditors | 280,516 | (128,910) |
| Cash generated from operations | 2,218,779 | 721,565 |
| Cash and cash equivalents at year end | 3,600,591 | 2,654,639 |
| Cash and cash equivalents at start of year | 2,654,639 | 2,215,696 |
| Bank overdrafts | - | (70) |
| Net cash and cash equivalents | 2,654,639 | 2,215,626 |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the profit before taxation in 2022?", "answer": "The profit before taxation in 2022 was £1,959,315."}, {"question": "How much were the depreciation charges in 2021?", "answer": "The depreciation charges in 2021 were £65,590."}, {"question": "Was there any loss on disposal of fixed assets in 2021?", "answer": "No, there was no loss on disposal of fixed assets in 2021."}, {"question": "What was the amount of finance costs in 2022?", "answer": "The finance costs in 2022 were £8,674."}, {"question": "How much was the dividend and interest income in 2021?", "answer": "The dividend and interest income in 2021 was £(180,467)."}, {"question": "What was the total cash generated from operations in 2022?", "answer": "The total cash generated from operations in 2022 was £2,218,779."}, {"question": "What were the cash and cash equivalents at the end of 2022?", "answer": "The cash and cash equivalents at the end of 2022 were £3,600,591."}, {"question": "What was the increase in trade and other creditors in 2022?", "answer": "The increase in trade and other creditors in 2022 was £280,516."}, {"question": "What were the cash and cash equivalents at the start of 2021?", "answer": "The cash and cash equivalents at the start of 2021 were £2,215,696."}, {"question": "Was there any bank overdraft at the end of 2021?", "answer": "Yes, there was a bank overdraft of £(70) at the end of 2021."}], "table_type": "Statement of Cash Flow"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides a summary of cash flow and debt status over a period from 1st March 2021 to 28th February 2022. It includes details of cash at the bank, debts falling due within one year, and debts falling due after one year. The table shows the cash flow changes and the total net cash position at the beginning and end of the period.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Description                      | At 1.3.21 | Cash flow | At 28.2.22 |
|----------------------------------|-----------|-----------|------------|
| Cash at bank                     | 2,654,639 | 945,952   | 3,600,591  |
| Debts falling due within 1 year  |           | (20,557)  | (20,557)   |
| Debts falling due after 1 year   | 1         | (224,643) | (224,643)  |
| Total                            | 2,654,639 | 700,752   | 3,355,391  |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the cash at bank on 1st March 2021?", "answer": "£2,654,639"}, {"question": "What was the cash flow during the period?", "answer": "£945,952"}, {"question": "What was the cash at bank on 28th February 2022?", "answer": "£3,600,591"}, {"question": "What was the total debt falling due within one year at the end of the period?", "answer": "£(20,557)"}, {"question": "What was the total debt falling due after one year at the end of the period?", "answer": "£(224,643)"}, {"question": "What was the total net cash at the beginning of the period?", "answer": "£2,654,639"}, {"question": "What was the total net cash at the end of the period?", "answer": "£3,355,391"}, {"question": "How much did the debts falling due after one year change during the period?", "answer": "£(224,643)"}, {"question": "What is the total change in cash flow during the period?", "answer": "£700,752"}, {"question": "What is the total net cash change from 1st March 2021 to 28th February 2022?", "answer": "£700,752"}], "table_type": "Statement of Cash Flow"}]

[{"table_description": "The table presents financial data in British Pounds (£) for the years 2022 and 2021 across different regions: United Kingdom, United States of America, and Asia. It includes the total amounts for each region and a grand total for both years.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Region                  | 2022      | 2021      |
|-------------------------|-----------|-----------|
| United Kingdom          | 8,650,874 | 8,564,288 |
| United States of America| 3,033,392 | 2,695,779 |
| Asia                    | 2,584,979 | 2,873,128 |
| **Total**               | 14,269,245| 14,133,195|", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the total amount for the United Kingdom in 2022?", "answer": "8,650,874"}, {"question": "How much did the United States of America generate in 2021?", "answer": "2,695,779"}, {"question": "Which region had the highest amount in 2022?", "answer": "United Kingdom"}, {"question": "What is the total amount for Asia in 2021?", "answer": "2,873,128"}, {"question": "What is the combined total for all regions in 2022?", "answer": "14,269,245"}, {"question": "Did the United Kingdom's amount increase or decrease from 2021 to 2022?", "answer": "Increase"}, {"question": "What was the total amount for all regions in 2021?", "answer": "14,133,195"}, {"question": "Which region had the lowest amount in 2021?", "answer": "United States of America"}, {"question": "By how much did the total amount for the United States of America increase from 2021 to 2022?", "answer": "337,613"}, {"question": "What is the difference in total amounts between 2022 and 2021 for all regions combined?", "answer": "136,050"}], "table_type": "Others"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides a comparison of operating income from two sources, 'Sundry receipts' and 'Government grants', for the years 2022 and 2021. The values are presented in British Pounds (£). The total operating income for each year is also provided.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Description         | 2022 (£) | 2021 (£) |
|---------------------|----------|----------|
| Sundry receipts     | 206      | 50,000   |
| Government grants   | 18,939   | 144,724  |
| **Total**           | 19,145   | 194,724  |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the total operating income in 2022?", "answer": "The total operating income in 2022 was £19,145."}, {"question": "What was the total operating income in 2021?", "answer": "The total operating income in 2021 was £194,724."}, {"question": "How much did 'Sundry receipts' contribute to the operating income in 2022?", "answer": "'Sundry receipts' contributed £206 to the operating income in 2022."}, {"question": "How much did 'Sundry receipts' contribute to the operating income in 2021?", "answer": "'Sundry receipts' contributed £50,000 to the operating income in 2021."}, {"question": "How much did 'Government grants' contribute to the operating income in 2022?", "answer": "'Government grants' contributed £18,939 to the operating income in 2022."}, {"question": "How much did 'Government grants' contribute to the operating income in 2021?", "answer": "'Government grants' contributed £144,724 to the operating income in 2021."}, {"question": "Which year had a higher total operating income?", "answer": "The year 2021 had a higher total operating income."}, {"question": "What is the difference in 'Sundry receipts' between 2022 and 2021?", "answer": "The difference in 'Sundry receipts' between 2022 and 2021 is £49,794."}, {"question": "What is the difference in 'Government grants' between 2022 and 2021?", "answer": "The difference in 'Government grants' between 2022 and 2021 is £125,785."}, {"question": "What is the total difference in operating income between 2022 and 2021?", "answer": "The total difference in operating income between 2022 and 2021 is £175,579."}], "table_type": "Others"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides a comparison of financial data related to employee compensation for the years 2022 and 2021. It includes figures for wages and salaries, social security costs, and other pension costs, all presented in British Pounds (£). The total costs for each year are also provided.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Description           | 2022 (£) | 2021 (£) |
|-----------------------|----------|----------|
| Wages and salaries    | 7,981,462| 7,857,432|
| Social security costs | 714,001  | 681,408  |
| Other pension costs   | 208,236  | 203,533  |
| **Total**             | 8,903,699| 8,742,373|", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the total cost for wages and salaries in 2022?", "answer": "The total cost for wages and salaries in 2022 was £7,981,462."}, {"question": "How much did social security costs amount to in 2021?", "answer": "Social security costs amounted to £681,408 in 2021."}, {"question": "What were the other pension costs in 2022?", "answer": "The other pension costs in 2022 were £208,236."}, {"question": "What is the total employee compensation cost for 2022?", "answer": "The total employee compensation cost for 2022 is £8,903,699."}, {"question": "How much did wages and salaries increase from 2021 to 2022?", "answer": "Wages and salaries increased by £124,030 from 2021 to 2022."}, {"question": "What is the difference in social security costs between 2022 and 2021?", "answer": "The difference in social security costs between 2022 and 2021 is £32,593."}, {"question": "By how much did other pension costs increase from 2021 to 2022?", "answer": "Other pension costs increased by £4,703 from 2021 to 2022."}, {"question": "What was the total employee compensation cost in 2021?", "answer": "The total employee compensation cost in 2021 was £8,742,373."}, {"question": "Which year had higher total employee compensation costs?", "answer": "The year 2022 had higher total employee compensation costs."}, {"question": "What is the total increase in employee compensation costs from 2021 to 2022?", "answer": "The total increase in employee compensation costs from 2021 to 2022 is £161,326."}], "table_type": "Balance Sheet"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides a breakdown of the average number of employees in different departments for the years 2022 and 2021. It includes data for Directors, Operations, Engineering, Sales & Marketing, and Administration, along with the total number of employees for each year.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Department          | 2022 | 2021 |
|---------------------|------|------|
| Directors Employees | 3    | 4    |
| Operations          | 60   | 62   |
| Engineering         | 18   | 15   |
| Sales & Marketing   | 7    | 7    |
| Administration      | 18   | 16   |
| **Total**           | 106  | 104  |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "How many directors were there in 2022?", "answer": "There were 3 directors in 2022."}, {"question": "What was the total number of employees in 2021?", "answer": "The total number of employees in 2021 was 104."}, {"question": "Which department had the same number of employees in both 2022 and 2021?", "answer": "The Sales & Marketing department had the same number of employees, 7, in both 2022 and 2021."}, {"question": "How many employees were in the Operations department in 2022?", "answer": "There were 60 employees in the Operations department in 2022."}, {"question": "Did the Engineering department have more employees in 2022 or 2021?", "answer": "The Engineering department had more employees in 2022, with 18 employees compared to 15 in 2021."}, {"question": "What is the difference in the number of employees in the Administration department between 2022 and 2021?", "answer": "The Administration department had 2 more employees in 2022 than in 2021."}, {"question": "How many employees were there in the Sales & Marketing department in 2022?", "answer": "There were 7 employees in the Sales & Marketing department in 2022."}, {"question": "What was the total increase in the number of employees from 2021 to 2022?", "answer": "The total increase in the number of employees from 2021 to 2022 was 2."}, {"question": "Which department had the largest number of employees in 2022?", "answer": "The Operations department had the largest number of employees in 2022, with 60 employees."}, {"question": "How many more employees were there in the Operations department in 2021 compared to the Engineering department in the same year?", "answer": "There were 47 more employees in the Operations department compared to the Engineering department in 2021."}], "table_type": "Others"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides a financial summary comparing various expenses and costs for the years 2022 and 2021. It includes data on depreciation of owned assets, loss on disposal of fixed assets, auditors' remuneration, share-based payments, research and development costs, operating lease rental costs, and foreign exchange differences. The values are presented in British Pounds (£).", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Description                          | 2022 (£) | 2021 (£) |
|--------------------------------------|----------|----------|
| Depreciation - owned assets          | 60,142   | 65,590   |
| Loss on disposal of fixed assets     | 2,150    |          |
| Auditors' remuneration               | 23,000   | 19,000   |
| Share-based payments                 | 28,219   | 28,219   |
| Research and development costs       | 721,711  | 727,745  |
| Operating lease rental costs         | 361,790  | 464,994  |
| Foreign exchange differences         | (97,071) | 171,609  |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the depreciation cost for owned assets in 2022?", "answer": "The depreciation cost for owned assets in 2022 was £60,142."}, {"question": "How much was the loss on disposal of fixed assets in 2022?", "answer": "The loss on disposal of fixed assets in 2022 was £2,150."}, {"question": "What was the auditors' remuneration in 2021?", "answer": "The auditors' remuneration in 2021 was £19,000."}, {"question": "Did the share-based payments change from 2021 to 2022?", "answer": "No, the share-based payments remained the same at £28,219 in both 2021 and 2022."}, {"question": "What were the research and development costs in 2022?", "answer": "The research and development costs in 2022 were £721,711."}, {"question": "How much did the operating lease rental costs decrease from 2021 to 2022?", "answer": "The operating lease rental costs decreased by £103,204 from 2021 to 2022."}, {"question": "What was the foreign exchange difference in 2021?", "answer": "The foreign exchange difference in 2021 was £171,609."}, {"question": "Was there a foreign exchange gain or loss in 2022?", "answer": "There was a foreign exchange gain of £97,071 in 2022."}, {"question": "Which year had higher research and development costs?", "answer": "The year 2021 had higher research and development costs at £727,745 compared to 2022."}, {"question": "What is the total of auditors' remuneration for both years?", "answer": "The total of auditors' remuneration for both years is £42,000."}], "table_type": "Others"}]

[{"table_description": "The table provides a breakdown of the tax charges on profit for the years 2022 and 2021. It includes current tax charges from different regions such as the UK, Hong Kong, USA, and Singapore, as well as the total current tax and deferred tax. [{"table_description": "The table provides a financial summary comparing the years 2022 and 2021. It includes figures for profit before tax, tax calculations based on the UK corporation tax rate, and various tax adjustments such as expenses not deductible for tax purposes, income not taxable, capital allowances, and R&D tax credits. The table concludes with the total tax charge for each year.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Description | 2022 (£) | 2021 (£) |
|---|---|---|
| Profit before tax | 1,959,315 | 858,789 |
| Profit multiplied by the standard rate of corporation tax in the UK of 19% | 372,270 | 163,170 |
| Expenses not deductible for tax purposes | 14,490 | 29,363 |
| Income not taxable for tax purposes |  | (34,289) |
| Capital allowances in excess of depreciation | (5,948) |  |
| Depreciation in excess of capital allowances |  | 4,257 |
| Impact of overseas tax rates | 28,887 | (60,779) |
| Tax credit due for R&D expenditure in the year |  | (20,161) |
| R&D enhancement |  | 11,486 |
| Total tax charge | 409,699 | 93,047 |", "q_and_a__pairs": [{"question": "What was the profit before tax in 2022?", "answer": "1,959,315"}, {"question": "What was the profit before tax in 2021?", "answer": "858,789"}, {"question": "What is the total tax charge for 2022?", "answer": "409,699"}, {"question": "What is the total tax charge for 2021?", "answer": "93,047"}, {"question": "How much were the expenses not deductible for tax purposes in 2022?", "answer": "14,490"}, {"question": "How much were the expenses not deductible for tax purposes in 2021?", "answer": "29,363"}, {"question": "What was the impact of overseas tax rates in 2022?", "answer": "28,887"}, {"question": "What was the impact of overseas tax rates in 2021?", "answer": "(60,779)"}, {"question": "Was there any income not taxable for tax purposes in 2022?", "answer": "No data provided"}, {"question": "What was the R&D enhancement in 2021?", "answer": "11,486"}], "table_type": "Others"}]

[{"table_description": "The table presents dividend information for different types of non-voting shares for the years 2022 and 2021. It includes data for 'C', 'E', and 'G' ordinary non-voting shares, with specific interim dividend amounts listed for each type. The table provides a comparison of the dividend amounts in British Pounds (£) for the two years.", "table_in_markdown_format": "| Share Type | 2022 (£) | 2021 (£) |
|---|---|---|
| 'C' Ordinary non-voting share of £1 | 22,500 | 92,484 |
